title: I Can and The You Can Attitude Part 3 of 3

description:
so..Â Monday's episode was the intro to "I can't" and we talked about what "I can't" really means internally.... then yesterday i shared with you how everyone's "I can't" is really an automatic response... some are hair trigger responses while with others it takes a lot more pressure. But we ALL have that automatic response.... Then, in yesterday's episode I shared with you how commercial AND social media are helping make that hair trigger prevalent in more and more of us... unconsciously.... So nowÂ today let's talk about what you can do to change your trigger, change your mind....improve your "I CAN" Attitude and thus improve your life...! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
